scripts.install: cd kite-web-element && npm i && cd ../kite-api && npm i
scripts.test: cd kite-web-element && npm run build && cd ../kite-api && docker-compose -f ../docker-compose.linux.yml build --no-cache && docker-compose -f ../docker-compose.linux.yml up -d
scripts.setupDev: cd kite-web-element && npm i && npm run build && cd ../kite-api && npm i && docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose up -d && cd ../kite-web-element && npm run serve --copy
scripts.setupProd: cd kite-web-element && npm i && npm run build && cd ../kite-api && npm i && docker-compose -f ../docker-compose.linux.yml build --no-cache && docker-compose -f ../docker-compose.linux.yml up -d
